Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 24th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1979...
Injured on 5/3/1980 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Traded from New York (N) to Pittsburgh on 2/5/1981 (Going to PIT: 1B K. Hrbek, RF V. Hayes, CF G. Redus, P B. Holton. Going to NYM: LF G. Matthews Sr., RF H. Kadota, P T. Johnson)...
Had first career hit on 5/6/1983, off Ray Corbin (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/10/1983, off Dan Petry (PHI)...
